Bash(git -C /Users/vjordan/Projects/ios/Challenge commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add screen-specific tracking system mirroring the navigator pattern

Introduce a 3-tier tracking architecture \(TrackerContract -> FeatureTrackerContract
-> FeatureTracker\) that mirrors the existing navigator pattern. Each screen gets its
own tracker contract, implementation, and events for type-safe tracking. Providers
are registered in AppContainer via a static factory method and configured at startup.

- Core: TrackerContract, Tracker, TrackingEvent, TrackingProviderContract \(inherits
  TrackerContract, adds configure\(\)\), ConsoleTrackingProvider, TrackerMock
- Features: screen-specific trackers for CharacterList, CharacterDetail, Home, and
  NotFound with full test coverage \(tracker tests, event tests, ViewModel tracking
  assertions\)
- AppContainer: creates Tracker with providers, injects into all features
- Documentation: update all READMEs, CLAUDE.md, and skills \(dependency-injection,
  viewmodel, project-structure, navigator\) to reflect tracking system

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
